#summary EBike Smart Controller for bicycles with Smart capabilities, with Bluetooth communication with Android Smartphones.

= Introduction =

An Open Source EBike Smart Controller for bicycles with Smart capabilities and hackable/configurable options for advanced users, with wireless (Bluetooth) communication with Android Smartphones.

The project is for now hosted *[http://endless-sphere.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=38337 here]*.
